Correction ID: This sheet lists corrective actions that PraDigi chef should take based on RE-pattern matching the Source URL of the content node. If a problem with a game is encountered during QA, can be added to this sheet with SKIP GAME action to skip it from the next chef run. Conversely, if a game is fixed (i.e. not more Android API issues) can be removed form this list so it will be imported on the next chef run.
